Name: Champagne Pick-Me-Up
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: A subtle hint of biscuity champagne shines through this very quaffable drink.
History: There are many versions of this classic cocktail but I have taken this one from Dale DeGroff's 2008 The Essential Cocktail where Dale credits this recipe to the Ritz Bar in Paris, France, circa 1936.
Nutrition: One serving of Champagne Pick-Me-Up contains 143 calories
